actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Market Transition Act to ensure that producers of all classes of soft white wheat (including club wheat) are permitted to repay marketing assistance loans, or receive loan deficiency payments, for the wheat at the same rate.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Market Transition Act to provide uniform rates for marketing assistance loans and loan deficiency payments for all classes of soft white wheat, including club wheat.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Market Transition Act to ensure that producers of all classes of soft white wheat (including club wheat) are permitted to repay marketing assistance loans, or receive loan deficiency payments, for the wheat at the same rate.
